page.title: 18A WELL KNOWN PERSONALITY
page.content:
{TED MOULT}
Ted Moult is a local farmer up in Ticknall. Round here he is famous for his strawberries; you can go and pick your own. Other people know him because he appears on television and radio. He does an advert for a firm that sells double glazing. He drops a feather to show that no draughts come through the window. Also he has been on a radio programme called{The Archers.} He went to the Derby school in Derby and afterwards he went into farming. He has been a farmer for forty-five years and has been living here for about twenty-eight years. He owns just under three hundred acres.
